settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.quote: I like that I can call up if I run into a problem with a customers car and they jump on the computer and control my tool for me. Well worth the money paid for the scanner and great service. They even went out of their way to help on a Saturday
The only people that have an actual phone number to call to speak to a real person. Top notch advice and service.

We brought a new Autel MS906BT for the workshop, Siobhan actually came out to our shop and set the tool up for us and showed us how to use it. The tool itself has been fantastic and does more than the snap-on we used to borrow from next door! Overall really good customer service and tools.

Had a really good experience with premium diagnostic equipment. I had a few questions about some products and the staff happily and quickly gave me all the answers I needed and explained everything so well. The staff were willing to help and are well educated on their products. Overall a great experience.

Ordered an i-drive from these guys and all it arrived the next day! The staff where helpful and took the time to educate me on how these things actually work. Not to mention it has turned my 79 series into an absolute BEAST. Thanks guys!

Just letting you know I received package today, am over the moon, thank you for your prompt responses and assistance, I will recommend you to other mechanics in the future.

Regards Kris.

Great customer service, really good to talk with if you have problems. Fast freight, just an all round great company. Really happy with the scan tool I got from these guys

Will definitely buy from these guys again!
We ordered a Foxwell scanner and they actually sent us the next model up at no additional cost. That was awesome. Thanks guys

Great experience with Premium Diagnostic Equipment, needed a few items and they were able to provide them same day - They even delivered them to me! Great Service. Definitely recommend to anyone who wants a fast & reliable service. They also have extra options for vehicle servicing, roadworthy certificates and Pre vehicle checks!

I am extremely happy with my experience with Premium Diagnostic Equipment.

I purchased the AUTEL MK906BT Scan Tool as a present for my partner and he was thrilled! It arrived securely packaged and with all the accessories required.

Overall I am very impressed and would highly recommend this business (especially if you are looking for assistance with the products like I was)!
Bloody beautiful tool. Very Happy with it. Highly recommend. Great bang for buck
We recieved two free face plates to go with our new throttle controller. Excellect service thank you team
Appreciate the time taken to help me get the right scanner for my car

settings.title: Are you looking for premium quality industry-standard vehicle scan tools for Australian cars at wholesale prices?
settings.text:
To diagnose and complete even the most basic repair on a modern vehicle, usually requires an advanced scan tool. This service used to only be available from a mechanical workshop, but not anymore. 

We’ve developed Premium Diagnostic Equipment to specialise in providing mechanics, workshops and car enthusiasts with industry-standard scan tools at wholesale prices.   

‏‏‎We are experts in this area who’ve worked in the industry for many years. We‏‏‎ ‎understand how the change in technology is affecting the industry and what you need to work on modern vehicles.

‏‏‎‏‏‎‎We supply leading brands at wholesale prices, meaning you can get the right scanners and equipment to complete your work without breaking the bank – we even offer free shipping.   

‏‏‎We can support you to make sure you purchase the right equipment with free advice available before you purchase, a support line for after purchase and a 30-day return policy. We offer remote in-house technical support via Teamviewer for our customers. You receive the support of a mechanic with every product.

If you can’t find what you’re looking for, you can call us to speak with one of our experts or download our detailed guide on choosing the right car diagnostic scanner & tool at below.

settings.title: Need Some Help?
settings.text: We have two ways to help you out with your purchasing decision:
